page.title: 14TRADE IN TIDWORTH
page.content: There is no major trade in Tidworth. We have no factories or manufacturing units. We have a wide selection of retail outlets including a dairy, hairdressers,turf accountant,food shops,furniture shops,cafes and public houses. There are three garages selling petrol,two of which sell second-hand cars. Salesmen of tax free cars for export come to the village on a regular basis. There is one bank which provides a full banking service. These premises are situated in the centre of the village and along the A338 going north and on the Zouch Estate. There are mobile tradesmen who call at the houses, a greengrocer,egg delivery, window cleaner and milkman. There is a fish and chip van, ice cream van and video film hire van. Unofficial traders who try to cheat soldiers are reported to the police.
